tool.name: Mesmer
tool.description: Mesmer for whole-cell segmentation of multiplexed tissue imaging data
tool.command:
ln -s '$nuclear_image' input.tif && @CMD_BEGIN@ --output-directory ./ --output-name mask.tif --nuclear-image input.tif --nuclear-channel $nuclear_channel --compartment $compartment --image-mpp $image_mpp
#if $membrane_select.membrane_segment == 'True' --membrane-image '$membrane_select.membrane_image' --membrane-channel '$membrane_select.membrane_channel' #end if #if $squeeze --squeeze #end if

param.name: nuclear_channel
param.label: The numerical index of the channel(s) from nuclear-image

param.name: image_mpp
param.label: Resolution of the image in microns-per-pixel

param.name: squeeze
param.label: Whether to np.squeeze the outputs before saving

param.name: membrane_image
param.label: The path to an image containing the membrane marker(s)

param.name: membrane_channel
param.label: The numerical index of the channel(s) from membrane-image
